task.voice: 我们的项目，是通过核心零部件及智能体技术的全自研，为大家生产出极致成本的人形机器人，工程师亲手创造的美拉和美罗不仅性价比满满，还很聪明呢！
task.voice_en: Our project is all about developing our own core components and AI agent to produce humanoid robots at the ultimate cost. The Meras and Meros, created by our engineers with their own hands, are not only cost-effective but also very smart!
